body_html: Was the change of test_jit.cpp and inclusion of Catch necessary for this PR? @ezyang and I have discussed Catch before, but we'll want to review more carefully whether we want to add this dependency. Either way, it seems like a totally orthogonal change from separating the C++ parts from the Python build? This PR was already quite large and this would make it unnecessarily larger. It could be a follow-up PR.

body: Was the change of `test_jit.cpp` and inclusion of Catch necessary for this PR? @ezyang and I have discussed Catch before, but we'll want to review more carefully whether we want to add this dependency. Either way, it seems like a totally orthogonal change from separating the C++ parts from the Python build? This PR was already quite large and this would make it unnecessarily larger. It could be a follow-up PR.
